name: ELECTROLIFE 2097
description:
My Jam entry for Ludum Dare 41: 

It's a Good Vibe Photography Killer simulator.

Move with WASD / Arrow keys, Shoot with Left Mouse Button or CTRL, rest of the controls are in the game

(I've playtested mostly on touchpad, the controls work well on that if you're on a laptop, no need for twitch reflexes!)
